summary: A former summer camp caretaker, horribly burned from a prank gone wrong, lurks around an upstate New York summer camp bent on killing the teenagers responsible for his disfigurement.
cast: Brian Matthews|Leah Ayres|Brian Backer|Larry Joshua|Jason Alexander|Ned Eisenberg|Carrick Glenn|Carolyn Houlihan|Fisher Stevens|Lou David|Shelley Bruce|Sarah Chodoff|Bonnie Deroski|Holly Hunter|Kevi Kendall|J.R. McKechnie|George Parry|Ame Segull|Jeff DeHart|Bruce Kluger|Keith Mandell|Jerry McGee|Mansoor Najee-ullah|Willie Reale|John Roach|K.C. Townsend|John Tripp|James Van Verth|Greg Hinaman|Timothy Klein|Robert O'Neill
title: La quema
